transcripts.text: Hello, everybody.  Carlton Pearson here with another word of affirmation, and maybe for some of you, confirmation.  Something you already know.  I'm not telling you something you don't already know.  I'm reminding you of what you already know and may have forgotten.  Hear this.  You are on an amazing journey to your soul.  You are expanding into higher dimensions.  The wisdom you gain will awaken your light body.  You are exactly where you should be and all is unfolding beautifully.  This is the path to enlightenment and your soul now leads the way.  That's another Carrie M. Bush and it is powerful.  Let me say it to you just one more time.  Hear it with your spirit.  You are on an amazing journey to your soul and as one, You are expanding into higher dimensions.  And the wisdom you gain will awaken your light body.  You are exactly where you should be.  And all is unfolding beautifully.  This is the path to enlightenment.  And your soul now leads the way.  God bless you.  God be you.  I love you so much.
